text:
October 7, 1939
Dr, Irvin Stewart, Director
Committee on Scientific Aida to Learning
41 East 42nd Street
New York, N.Y.
Dear Doctor Stewart:
In reply to your letter of October 5#
I am writing to say that the quoted statement from
the Federal Recorder Company is correct. In the
quotation a reference is made to Page 34, which
I presume refers to some other report - not NAEB.
Sincerely yours,
Frank E. Schooley
